mapper.insert:
insert into feeds_member_post_fandom (member_sn, fandom_id, post_title,post_content,post_newsfeeds, post_time) values (#{memberSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fandomId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{postTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{postNewsfeeds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: SELECT T1.id, T1.post_title, T1.post_content, T1.post_newsfeeds, T1.post_time, T1.like_count likes, T1.comment_count comments, T2.sn ui_sn, T2.nickname ui_nickname, T2.mobile ui_mobile, T2.email ui_email, T2.gender ui_gender, T2.member_avatar ui_member_avatar, d.id fi_id, d.fandom_name fi_fandom_name, d.fandom_intro fi_fandom_intro, d.fandom_avatar_url fi_fandom_avatar_url, (SELECT count(1) FROM feeds_member_post_like WHERE post_id = T1.id AND member_sn=#{memberSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) liked FROM feeds_member_fandom c, feeds_member_post_fandom T1, connects_member_profile T2, feeds_fandom d WHERE c.member_sn = #{memberSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND c.fandom_id = T1.fandom_id AND T1.member_sn = T2.sn AND c.fandom_id=d.id order by T1.id desc

SELECT a.id, a.post_title, a.post_content, a.post_newsfeeds, a.post_time, a.like_count likes, a.comment_count comments, b.sn ui_sn, b.nickname ui_nickname, b.member_avatar ui_member_avatar, (SELECT count(1) FROM feeds_member_post_like WHERE post_id = a.id AND member_sn=#{memberSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) liked FROM feeds_member_post_fandom a, connects_member_profile b, connects_member_relation c WHERE c.my_member_sn = #{memberSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND c.friend_member_sn = a.member_sn AND a.member_sn=b.sn AND a.post_newsfeeds = '1' AND c.relation_status IN ('10','11') AND a.fandom_id IS NULL ORDER BY a.id DESC

SELECT f.id, f.post_title, f.post_content, f.post_newsfeeds, f.post_time, p.sn ui_sn, p.nickname ui_nickname, p.member_avatar ui_member_avatar, g.id fi_id, g.fandom_name fi_fandom_name, g.fandom_intro fi_fandom_intro, g.fandom_avatar_url fi_fandom_avatar_url FROM feeds_member_post_fandom f LEFT JOIN feeds_fandom g ON g.id=f.fandom_id LEFT JOIN connects_member_profile p ON f.member_sn = p.sn WHERE f.post_title LIKE concat('%',#{searchVal},'%') or f.post_content LIKE concat('%',#{searchVal},'%')

SELECT p.id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.post_newsfeeds, p.post_time, p.like_count likes, ( SELECT count(1) FROM feeds_member_post_like l WHERE l.member_sn = #{currentSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and l.post_id=p.id ) liked, p.comment_count comments, f.id fi_id, f.fandom_name fi_fandom_name, f.fandom_parent_id fi_fandom_parent_id, f.fandom_creator_sn fi_fandom_creator_sn, f.fandom_avatar_url fi_fandom_avatar_url, f.fandom_intro fi_fandom_intro, mp.sn ui_sn, mp.nickname ui_nickname, mp.member_avatar ui_member_avatar FROM feeds_member_post_fandom p LEFT JOIN feeds_fandom f ON f.id = p.fandom_id LEFT JOIN connects_member_profile mp ON mp.sn = p.member_sn WHERE p.id = #{postId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT f.id, f.post_title, f.post_content, f.post_newsfeeds, f.post_time, (SELECT count(1) FROM feeds_member_post_like WHERE post_id = f.id AND member_sn=#{memberSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) liked, f.like_count likes, f.comment_count comments, m.id fi_id, m.fandom_name fi_fandom_name, m.fandom_parent_id fi_fandom_parent_id, m.fandom_avatar_url fi_fandom_avatar_url, m.fandom_creator_sn fi_fandom_creator_sn, m.fandom_intro fi_fandom_intro FROM feeds_member_post_fandom f LEFT JOIN connects_member_profile p ON f.member_sn = p.sn LEFT JOIN feeds_fandom m ON f.fandom_id = m.id WHERE f.member_sn = #{friendSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY f.id DESC
